messages: 98e5b851bd2fd05b0d06825182bc9a9a (05:29): oh, how wonderful is that latest message on the list :)
72af1cb61d47fcc5d18402bf3d1c147d (05:29): f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb: what's the cheapest online retailer for digital camera stuff in japan ?
72af1cb61d47fcc5d18402bf3d1c147d (05:30): I don't know who is this John Bachir but I think he could leave the group...

a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (05:32): 72af1cb61d47fcc5d18402bf3d1c147d - the online electronics retailers here in japan are all in a competitive steel-cage death match to undercut each others' business in every way they can, so their base prices are mostly the same
72af1cb61d47fcc5d18402bf3d1c147d (05:32): but I did appreciate the miniskirts of the waitresses
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (05:33): the best is whichever one, when you go into the shop and haggle with them, gives you the most free stuff when you buy somehing :)
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (05:33): ? I must have missed the miniskirted waitressess at biccamera
f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb (05:34): the latest message should just be ignored, IMHO. it
f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb (05:34): or 72af1cb61d47fcc5d18402bf3d1c147d you can try to convince me to bring something ;) if I come in France in May ;)
a03bfa2a78d00389c65221c74759cbb4 (05:38): replied to John Bachir's e-mail
72af1cb61d47fcc5d18402bf3d1c147d (05:42): 98e5b851bd2fd05b0d06825182bc9a9a, Lachy, I am about to answer too
056705610ffb1726be04db950e5feebe (05:50): OMG! John should keep email like that to himself.
056705610ffb1726be04db950e5feebe (05:51): really wanted to use lots of swear words then....
72af1cb61d47fcc5d18402bf3d1c147d (05:52): 056705610ffb1726be04db950e5feebe: I used swear words when I read his prose, then cooled down and replied calmly :-)
72af1cb61d47fcc5d18402bf3d1c147d (05:52): f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb: biccamera.com is not much cheaper than french prices on a 30D body for instance ; not worth the pain
056705610ffb1726be04db950e5feebe (05:53): hehe, yeah. I won't even bother replying to that... I think "borderline bigotry" captures it nicely.
72af1cb61d47fcc5d18402bf3d1c147d (06:00): still needs to find a really good yakitorin paris
72af1cb61d47fcc5d18402bf3d1c147d (06:06): wonders if he is the only ac-rep in this case :-)
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (06:07): 72af1cb61d47fcc5d18402bf3d1c147d - I noticed many many yakitori places in Montparnasse, near where the theatres are
f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb (06:07): the URI has been published in a member area?
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (06:07): I don't know if they are good because I didn't try them. I found a really great Lebanese place those

72af1cb61d47fcc5d18402bf3d1c147d (06:07): a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2: unfortunately, there are a lot of "japanese" restaurants in paris in fact held by chinese people ; food is not that good there
72af1cb61d47fcc5d18402bf3d1c147d (06:08): f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb: sent by steve bratt to AC Members list
